name: LockGithubIssue
description:
Lock a GitHub issue or pull request conversation.

Use this tool to prevent further interactions with a specific GitHub issue or pull request by locking its conversation. It requires push access to the repository.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository in which the issue or pull request exists. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the GitHub issue to lock.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

parameters.name: issue_lock_reason
parameters.description: The reason for locking the conversation. Acceptable values: 'off-topic', 'too heated', 'resolved', 'spam'.

value_schema.description:
The reason for locking the issue or pull request conversation. Lock will fail if you don't use one of these reasons:  
 * `off-topic`  
 * `too heated`  
 * `resolved`  
 * `spam`
